Note: Signed "Abel Faivre." Date based on dated of 1st World War. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Text in French speaks of the Loan for the Liberation. Illustration shows a man in a cape, holding a sword leading a march of flags.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
